His music unifies traditional and modern themes.
sentences.cn: 他的音乐结合了传统和现代的主题。

sentences.en: I cannot wait until March 4 and to unify the belts.
sentences.cn: 我迫不及待3月4日统一金腰带.

sentences.cn: 它可以将材料的本体性质与表面的抗凝血性有效地结合起来.

sentences.en: It is difficult to imagine how the North and South could ever agree on a formula to unify the divided peninsula.
sentences.cn: 很难想象南北双方在统一半岛的方案上究竟怎样才能达成一致。

sentences.en: Perfect literary works always manage to unify progressive ideas with artistic forms.

sentences.en: Someone in charge of quality control should unify the printing with the rest of the book.
sentences.cn: 质量检查人员应使该书的印刷质量与其他方面相称.

sentences.en: Strong support for the war has unified the nation.
sentences.cn: 对战争的坚决支持使这个国家团结了起来。

sentences.en: To make into a whole by bringing all parts together; unify.

sentences.cn: 整体灯光与周围建筑灯光风格协调一致.

words.tran_cn: 统一；使一致（unify的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 统一， 使成一体； 使相同
trans.tran_en: if you unify two or more parts or things, or if they unify, they are combined to make a single unit

trans.tran_cn: 使联合，使相同，使一致，统一
trans.tran_en: if you unify two or more parts or things, or if they unify, they are combined to make a single unit
